snippet: Cecile Jackson was charged with trying to take the 2-year-old from a playground last week, before his nanny intervened.
abstract: Police arrest Cecile Jackson, identifying her as woman who attempted to take 2-year-old boy who was sitting on swing in Manhattan's Central Park; Jackson is charged with attempted second-degree kidnapping.
lead_paragraph: Cecile Jackson was charged with trying to take the 2-year-old from a playground last week, before his nanny intervened.

headline.main: Woman Arrested in Attempted Kidnapping of Boy in Central Park
headline.print_headline: Arrest Is Made After Attempt to Kidnap Boy
